misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
misuses.description: The use of the MD4 algorithm is considered broken and should not be used for cryptographic purposes. It is recommended to use a more secure algorithm, such as SHA-256 or stronger.
misuses.recommendation: Replace the use of the MD4 algorithm with a more secure algorithm, such as SHA-256 or stronger.
